snippet.title: Hello Kitty World - iPhone & iPad Gameplay Video
snippet.description:
Gameplay Video of " Hello Kitty World " by iGamesView (http://goo.gl/b2CUh)

Game Category: ["Games", "Kids", "Family", "Entertainment"]

App Link: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/hello-kitty-world/id505780419?mt=8

Want to see your game videos on this channel? Email us the details at info@igamesview.com
Connect with us for regular updates on iPhone, iPad, iPod Game Reviews, News, Previews, Trailers, Cheat Codes, Game Play Videos & Walkthroughs.

****************************************************************************
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/igamesview
Twitter @ iGamesView: http://twitter.com/iGamesView
YouTube: http://www.youtube.com/user/iGamesView
Google Plus: https://plus.google.com/113561280080793713543/posts
********************************************
Logos and trademarks belong to respective owners.

iTunes Description :

★Valentine Series on sale♪
For a limited time only!!

♡ﾟ･*:.｡Welcome to Hello Kitty World ｡.:*･ﾟ♡
Your favourite Sanrio characters Hello Kitty, My Melody, Little Twin Stars & Kuromi come together in brand new game!!
Create your dream amusement park with Hello Kitty!!!


♡ﾟ･*:.｡ Create your very own dream world filled with Sanrio characters ｡.:*･ﾟ♡
Featuring a whole variety of Sanrio themed attractions and Shops
Use your creativity and entertain visitors from around the world!



♡ﾟ･*:.｡ So many Sanrio characters all together in one game｡.:*･ﾟ♡
You're not dreaming!!! All the famous Sanrio characters are getting together to star in the greatest attraction park ever !
Everybody is here: Hello Kitty, Kuromi, My Melody, Patty and Jimmy available.
Also coming are Charmmy Kitty, Little Twin Stars, Purin, Cinnamoroll, Minna no Tabo, Badtz-maru, Pekkle & Keroppi.
Be sure to check out the fun as all these character super stars roam about this fantasy world!



♡ﾟ･*:.｡Original Shop & Attraction Designs｡.:*･ﾟ♡
Each of the attractions and shops featured are unique to this game!
There's a whole range of fun-filled rides, unique to each character, with which to entertain your visitors.
Look closely and you can even see visitors having fun in your park!



♡ﾟ･*:.｡ Original Virtual Merchandise ...｡.:*･ﾟ♡
Build shops and sell cute and original items modelled on the image of Sanrio characters.
Your visitor will be able to buy various item such as "Hello Kitty Hats", "My Melody balloons", "Cinnamoroll bags" and much more!
Be sure to check out the visitors wandering in your park and wearing all those original items!



♡ﾟ･*:.｡ Play with your friends｡.:*･ﾟ♡
Connect with your friends through Facebook, Twitter and Game Center, why not drop off some present in your friends park!
Connect with your friends, help each other and have fun!

Operation:iOS4.3+
Handset:iPhone 3GS, iPhone 4, iPhone 4S, iPhone 5, iPod touch 3rd Generation(32GB、64GB), iPod touch 4th generation, iPod touch 5th generation, iPad, iPad2, New iPad
